mcq.statement: Identify the correct sentence: Neither the coach nor the players were late., Neither the coach nor the players was late., Neither the coach or the players were late., Neither the coach and the players was late.

options.a: Neither the coach nor the players were late.
options.b: Neither the coach nor the players was late.
options.c: Neither the coach or the players were late.
options.d: Neither the coach and the players was late.
